notes: CMMC L2 AC.L2-3.1.1 is directly derived from NIST 800-171 3.1.1 and has identical requirements
NIST 800-171 R3 control 03.01.01 is the same requirement as NIST 800-171 R2 3.1.1, with updated control ID format
CIS 3.3 (Configure Data Access Control Lists) implements the requirement to limit system access to authorized users
CMMC L2 AC.L2-3.1.2 is directly derived from NIST 800-171 3.1.2 and has identical requirements
NIST 800-171 R3 control 03.01.02 is the same requirement as NIST 800-171 R2 3.1.2, with updated control ID format
CIS 3.3 (Configure Data Access Control Lists) implements the requirement to limit system access to authorized transactions and functions
CMMC L2 AC.L2-3.1.5 is directly derived from NIST 800-171 3.1.5 and has identical requirements
NIST 800-171 R3 control 03.01.05 is the same requirement as NIST 800-171 R2 3.1.5, with updated control ID format
CIS 6.8 (Define and Maintain Role-Based Access Control) implements the principle of least privilege through role-based access control
CMMC L2 AC.L2-3.1.11 is directly derived from NIST 800-171 3.1.11 and has identical requirements
NIST 800-171 R3 control 03.01.10 is the same requirement as NIST 800-171 R2 3.1.11, with updated control ID format
CIS 4.3 (Configure Automatic Session Locking on Enterprise Assets) implements the requirement to terminate sessions after periods of inactivity
CMMC L2 AT.L2-3.2.1 is directly derived from NIST 800-171 3.2.1 and has identical requirements
NIST 800-171 R3 control 03.02.01 is the same requirement as NIST 800-171 R2 3.2.1, with updated control ID format
CIS 14.1 (Establish and Maintain a Security Awareness Program) directly implements the requirements for security awareness
CMMC L2 IA.L2-3.5.10 is directly derived from NIST 800-171 3.5.10 and has identical requirements
NIST 800-171 R3 control 03.05.07 is the same requirement as NIST 800-171 R2 3.5.10, with updated control ID format

CIS 3.10 (Encrypt Sensitive Data in Transit) partially addresses the requirement for cryptographically-protected passwords by ensuring encryption of data in transit, which would include password transmission
CMMC L1 MP.L1-3.8.3 is directly derived from NIST 800-171 3.8.3 and has identical requirements
NIST 800-171 R3 control 03.08.03 is the same requirement as NIST 800-171 R2 3.8.3, with updated control ID format
CIS 3.5 (Securely Dispose of Data) directly implements the requirement to securely dispose of media containing sensitive data
